GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
crypto: qat - fix memory leak in RSA

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit a843925e0287eebb4aa808666bf22c664dfe4c53, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 879f77e9071f029e1c9bd5a75814ecf51370f846. For more details please see the references link.
